attributes.additional_details:
It’s become obvious to many the MPs have decided for their constituency’s best interests and not taken into account the democratic referendum result and have failed to understand their constituency’s have already voted. 
Most MPs have done everything possible to frustrate and stop Brexit in favour of the remainers.
They seem to want an ideology EU globalisation state and constantly keep scaremongering the public’s votes, which will only damage democracy and sovereignty.
attributes.background: MPs have acted unlawfully and undemocratic to the Brexit referendum result.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
